name: .XMF File Extension
summary: Learn about .XMF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Three-dimensional model mesh file created with Cal3D, an open source character animation library; contains polygons made up of nodes and edges, which comprise the geometry of the character; gives the model its skeletal structure.

content: Cal3D meshes are more commonly stored using the binary .CMF format.
NOTE: Cal3D models are used for applications such as IMVU, a 3D online chatting application that uses XMF files for virtual avatars.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
